name: devsuite
description: Una suite integral de herramientas para desarrolladores y creativos, diseñada para ser rápida, intuitiva y estéticamente agradable.

scripts.prepare-public: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('public')) fs.rmSync('public', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('public/dist', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync('public/icons', { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync('index.html', 'public/index.html'); fs.copyFileSync('manifest.json', 'public/manifest.json'); fs.copyFileSync('service-worker.js', 'public/service-worker.js'); try { fs.cpSync('icons', 'public/icons', { recursive: true }); } catch (e) {} "
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-public && npm run build:css && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/dist/bundle.js --servedir=public --port=8000 & npm run watch:css
scripts.build: npm run prepare-public && npm run build:css -- --minify && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/dist/bundle.js --minify --jsx=automatic
